questionDescription: Are you using a shower head to take a shower?

questionOptions.Tips: Fantastic! Do you know there are several types of shower heads. A low-flow shower head uses about 2 gallons of water a minute.

questionDescription: Will you spend more than 15 minutes in the shower?

questionDescription: Do you take more than one shower in a day?

questionDescription: In average, Can you count how many toilet flushes you use? Is it more than 10 toilet flushes in a day?

questionOptions.Tips: Reminder! Using half flushes and automatic flushes can save more water.
